job_title: Sr Java Developer with Strong BPM Exp
jd: From: KIRAN, Softcom Systems, Inc mkiran@softcomsystems.com Reply to: mkiran@softcomsystems.com Please Only Local Resumes!! Banking & Financial Domain Experience required must recent projects, without experience please don't send resumesHi,Hope you are doing good.This is Kiran from Softcom System,We have below urgent requirements. Please find the below JD and share your interest,Role: Sr Java Developer with Strong BPM ExpLocation: Weehawken, NJDuration: 12+ MonthsJob Description:• Overall 10+ years of experience in Java Development • Minimum 5+ years of Expertise in design and implementation of BPM Solutions using BPM suite • Full-stack developer with end-to-end (front-end and back-end) software development experience in Java, J2EE, XML/JSON technology suite, HTML etc.• Expertise with Node.js, AngularJS and RedHat suite of projects • Working experience with Spring Boot and Open Source frameworks.• Database skills that include database design, data modeling, data analysis, and SQL. Also should have worked with various databases such as Oracle, Postgres.• Broad experience designing, planning, implementing, maintaining, and documenting Enterprise Application Integration (EAI) based solutions using integration suite of products.• Expertise with building CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, Helm, Kubernetes, RH OpenShift cli on AWS Cloud.
